tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE polling_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  zip_code VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE PollingLocations (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name STRING,
  address STRING,
  city STRING,
  state STRING
);

CREATE TABLE polling_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE voting_machines (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_type VARCHAR(100),
    location_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES polling_locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE machine_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (machine_id) REFERENCES voting_machines(machine_id)
)

CREATE TABLE election_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    election_name VARCHAR(100),
    candidate_name VARCHAR(100),
    votes_received INT,
    winning_candidate BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE polling_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    state TEXT,
    zipcode INT
);

CREATE TABLE voting_machines (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name TEXT,
    location_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE machine_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    action TEXT,
    action_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE machine_issues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    reported_by TEXT,
    reported_date TIMESTAMP
);
